CustomField.description: Optional shipping postal code for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's '"Shipping Postal Code" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional shipping postal code for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's '"Shipping Postal Code" field.
CustomField.label: Shipping Postal Code
